channel.title: Orchestral Drum Sound
channel.description:
Hey I got a random specific question, but maybe somebody can help me out. I was just wondering if anybody knew how to create this big percussion sound in Auxy, or if they could tell me what it’s called so I can look for a sample? It could just be a big sounding Tom, but maybe it has some fancy orchestral name? Thanks!
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=i0yR4Eam3d8

item.title: Orchestral Drum Sound
item.dc:creator: Andrew_Adams
item.description:
Sweet, thanks guys

Read full topic

item.title: Orchestral Drum Sound
item.dc:creator: BobTheGUYYYYY
item.description:
I agree. The toms in Oregon actually work pretty well for that sound, and try turning the reverb up all the way for that and an acoustic bass drum. I think you may get a similar effect.

Read full topic

item.title: Orchestral Drum Sound
item.dc:creator: SpaghettiSauce
item.description:
Sounds like a bass drum with toms. Exactly what @NotMiles said.

Read full topic
